frontmatter.title: Simulating a bark beetle outbreak in Julia
frontmatter.short: Bark beetles reproduce in the inner bark of trees. Many species attack and kill live trees. Most, however, live in dead, weakened, or dying hosts. They play a tremendous role in forest ecology - some people fear that beetles plague could annihilate even strong and healthy forests. Are those fears justified?

frontmatter.title: Wildcamping in the center of Arad

frontmatter.title: Coffee betokens great adventure
